list-view-config.query-select: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX core: <http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#> PREFIX afn: <http://jena.hpl.hp.com/ARQ/function#> PREFIX vitro: <http://vitro.mannlib.cornell.edu/ns/vitro/0.7#> PREFIX vcard: <http://www.w3.org/2006/vcard/ns#> PREFIX core: <http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#> PREFIX obo: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/> SELECT ?indivInRole ?indivInRoleLabel ?roleLabel ?role (group_concat(?termld; separator= ' / ') as ?terms) where { ?subject ?property ?role . ?role a core:TeacherRole . ?role obo:RO_0000052 ?indivInRole . ?indivInRole rdfs:label ?indivInRoleLabel . ?role rdfs:label ?roleLabel . ?dti core:description ?termld . ?role core:dateTimeInterval ?dti . ?dti rdf:type core:DateTimeInterval . ?dti core:start ?dtidstart . ?dtidstart core:dateTime ?dstart . } group by ?indivInRole ?indivInRoleLabel ?roleLabel ?role order by ?indivInRoleLabel ?dstart
